sub_title: Empowering Technical Professionals to give Inspiring Presentations!
summary:
Want to give a persuasive presentation?

I’ve gone from being an introverted software engineer to a TEDx speaker, bestselling author and presentation skills trainer & coach.

My presentation skills workshops score > 9/10.

If I can learn how to give a persuasive and confident presentation, anyone can!

Watch: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BmEiZadVNWY
Read: http://www.speakinspireempower.com
Contact: https://www.markrobinsontraining.com

I look forward to hearing from you!

Mark Robinson is a presentation skills trainer and bestselling author via Mark Robinson Training; TEDx speaker and speaker coach.

projects.title: Agile Expertise Group
projects.description:
Agile works great in Software Development, why shouldn't it work in other fields of engineering and even beyond engineering?

After having worked with Agile in software development environments for years, the question above kept us busy. So we dived in and challenged our ideas in practice. We found that it is perfectly possible to take Agile beyond software!

If you are interested and want to learn more about Agile. Don't hesitate and send me a personal message. Mark and I are sharing our findings in an Agile workshop.

profile_positions.description:
After giving a popular speech (> 300K views) at TEDxEindhoven entitled "How to present to keep your audience’s attention", I started to give presentation skills workshops to my colleagues.

Now I give Advanced Presentation Skills training full-time to (especially technical) people for various customers in many countries. I have trained over 2000 professionals in over 200 workshops and also coached many leaders to help them give powerful speeches.

Average course score: 9.3 / 10. See markrobinsontraining.com for full details.
profile_positions.title: Presentation Skills Trainer

profile_positions.description:
Order via: http://www.speakinspireempower.com and:
 - all Amazon sites (eg https://www.amazon.com/Speak-Inspire-Empower-Persuasive-Presentations/dp/B08BD9D3RB)
 - bol.com: https://www.bol.com/nl/p/speak-inspire-empower/9300000005284587/
 - ManagementBoek.nl: https://www.managementboek.nl/boek/9798650026846/speak-inspire-empower-mark-robinson

Look inside via: https://www.amazon.com/Speak-Inspire-Empower-Persuasive-Presentations/dp/B08BD9D3RB

Read (and write) reviews at Goodreads:
https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/54272514-speak-inspire-empower

Number 1 best seller of all books (all categories) on Amazon Netherlands after release:
https://www.amazon.nl/Speak-Inspire-Empower-Persuasive-Presentations/dp/B08BD9D3RB

If you had to give a speech to a hundred colleagues today, how would you feel? Mark Robinson would feel confident, but it wasn't always that way. In Speak Inspire Empower, he explains his secrets of presenting to any audience - how you can keep them hanging on your every word and persuade them to follow your call to action.

In this book, you'll learn how to:

- get everyone's attention from your first words
- have a clear goal for your presentation
- build self-confidence for your talk
- learn from the very best public speakers of today
- persuade your audience using influence techniques

And he relates his personal story, how he gave his first presentation - terrified - to how he ended up on the TEDx stage to give the popular talk: "How to present to keep your audience's attention".

This book is unlike any other on public speaking. The techniques are powerful and practical. Each chapter contains exercises for you to implement what you've learnt. His personal story is as inspiring as it is fun to read.

And his message of positive feedback is something everyone needs to hear.

Illustrator: Hani Javan Hemmat
Editor: Simone Roach

Amazon author page: https://www.amazon.com/Mr-Mark-Robinson/e/B08BV25GZY

The above roles required requirements gathering, implementation, testing, presenting, coaching, training and liasing with suppliers, internal customers and management.

profile_positions.description: “How to present to keep your audience’s attention” is a question that Mark knows how to answer. He has gone from believing that it was impossible for him to speak in public to someone who gets great reviews whenever he speaks at conferences. Presentation skills are of course key to a TEDx event which is why Mark Robinson was invited for TEDxEindhoven. The city of Eindhoven is full of engineers giving technical presentations every day. Being an engineer himself, Mark has experienced a few too many boring presentations. Presentation skills are learnable, Mark himself is proof of that. In this talk Mark explains his journey, shares his best tips, shows how not to present and tells us why it is so important to captivate your audience.
